layout.singingstanza: Hav -- ing been re -- gen -- er -- at -- ed Not of cor -- rupt -- i -- ble seed but of in -- cor -- rupt -- i -- ble. Through the liv -- ing and a -- bid -- ing word of God; Through the liv -- ing and a -- bid -- ing word of God. As new -- born babes long for the Guile -- less milk of the word That by it you may grow un -- to Sal -- va -- tion... Hav -- ing been re -- gen -- er -- at -- ed Not of cor -- rupt -- i -- ble seed but of in -- cor -- rupt -- i -- ble. Through the liv -- ing and a -- bid -- ing word of God; Through the liv -- ing and a -- bid -- ing word of God.

lyrics.stanza: Having been regenerated Not of corruptible seed but of incorruptible. Through the living and abiding word of God; Through the living and abiding word of God.
As newborn babes long for the Guileless milk of the word That by it you may grow unto Salvation... (Repeat stanza 1)
